annotations.description: Up metric is 0 since for job '{{ $labels.instance}}'   '{{ $labels.job}}'  '{{ $labels.service}}' for  1m the last 5m
annotations.summary:
Up metric is 0 since for job '{{ $labels.instance}}'   '{{ $labels.job}}'  '{{ $labels.service}}' for  1m the last 5m .

The scrape can fail when: 

When scrape target was unreachable during the scrape.

When the target didn't return response during the configured timeout. The timeout can be configured via scrape_timeout option. By default it is set to 10 seconds. 

When there was a network issue during the scrape, which prevented from successful scrape.

When the scrape target returns incorrect or incomplete response. The response must contain metrics with values in Prometheus text exposition format.
